meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Richmond Curtiss Natalie Kistner Jose Garriga Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7015.

td.p: Richmond Curtiss, a location coordinator from Palm Springs, California
Natalie Kistner, a director of business development from Plano, Texas
Jose Garriga, a communications specialist from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,401)

tr.td: HOW INNOVATIVE!
U.N. INTERNATIONAL YEARS
AT THE DRUGSTORE
NOT IN THE BIBLE
(Alex: We'll give you some choices.)
(Alex: Give us the song title in...)
MUSICAL SHE'S
CATTY WORDS & PHRASES
